title: Chris Hayes | Trump Repeats Coronavirus Failures in Push to "Reopen" Economy: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump pushing to prematurely reopen the economy.

Then, he talks to MSNBC's Chris Hayes about the current state of the pandemic and the 2020 presidential election.
